decision.reasoning: Market at 57.2% YES (Seahawks) aligns closely with ESPN Analytics (60.2%) and sharp action moving spread to Seahawks -4.5, implying ~62-65% favorite. Conservative: small contra-crowd position on NO to exploit potential upset narratives.
